The magical mystery tour is waiting to take you away
 Waiting to take you away
In the context of the movie for whom this song was written for, the Beatles themselves are leading a mystery tour, conducted in a colourful bus. So of course they had to invite some passengers.

Roll up, roll up for the mystery tour
 Roll up, roll up for the mystery tour
 Roll up (And that’s an invitation), roll up for the mystery tour
 Roll up (To make a reservation), roll up for the mystery tour
The song could easily be perceived as being about undergoing recreational drug use. The roll up referring to rolling up a joint, the song is essentially an invitation to get high.

(Roll up! Roll up for the magical mystery tour!
 Step right this way!)
A Magical Mystery Tour was a bus trip to an unknown destination. They were popular in England at the time.
